name: RickRoller
0:
”Alexa open Rick Roller”
”How are you today”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rick roller
des:
In order to use the app, first tell Alexa to 'Open Rick Roller'. Alexa will responds by saying 'Rickroll primed'. Now all you have to do is wait for someone to ask Alexa one of the following things:
- Play some music
- Play a good song
- How are you
- How are you today
- Set a timer
- Tell me the news
Once they do this, they will instantly be rickrolled.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
